course.subject: LANG
course.name: English Language II
course.description: The course aims to develop students' proficiency in English as well as their academic literacy skills, so that they can cope with the linguistic demands of studying through the medium of English. The course aims to bring students' competence in academic writing and their ability to engage in oral interaction in academic contexts.
course.exclusions: LANG 101 (prior to 2011-12), LANG 102 (prior to 2011-12), LANG 1028 (prior to 2012-13), LANG 1049 (prior to 2012-13)

reviews.author: Charlenelok
reviews.comment_content:
Boring class. Many calculations are required both in class or after class.
Excel skills are expected because of quite a lot of taking home excel exercises.
Financial calculators are needed in class. (expected to use in class and after class).
Each chap needs to do exercises and some online quizzes.
reviews.comment_teaching:
Boring. Since zoom class, you can afk easily.
Not many questions are needed to answer.
The professor won't ask directly.
reviews.comment_workload:
Quite high.
Three quizzes in total for 12 chapters
The final exam covers a lot!
Each chap has take-home exercise.
